details.description:
The role of an HR (Human Resources) Executive is critical in managing various aspects of human capital within an organization. The specific responsibilities may vary depending on the size and structure of the organization, but here are common roles and responsibilities associated with HR executives:


Responsibilities:

  • Recruitment and Staffing:
  • Collaborate with department managers to understand staffing needs.
  • Develop and implement effective recruitment strategies.
  • Conduct interviews and participate in the selection process.
  • Coordinate and manage onboarding processes for new employees.
  • Employee Relations:
  • Mediate and resolve employee conflicts.
  • Address employee grievances and concerns.
  • Promote a positive and inclusive workplace culture.
  • Implement and enforce HR policies and procedures.
  • Performance Management:
  • Implement performance appraisal systems.
  • Provide feedback and coaching to employees.
  • Assist in the development of performance improvement plans.
  • Conduct periodic performance reviews.
  • Training and Development:
  • Identify training needs within the organization.
  • Plan and coordinate training programs.
  • Facilitate employee development initiatives.
  • Monitor and evaluate training effectiveness.
  • Compensation and Benefits:
  • Administer employee compensation and benefits programs.
  • Conduct salary surveys to ensure competitiveness.
  • Manage payroll processes and ensure accuracy.
  • Stay informed about industry trends in compensation and benefits.
  • HR Administration:
  • Maintain and update employee records.
  • Manage HR databases and systems.
  • Handle documentation related to personnel actions.
  • Ensure compliance with labor laws and regulations.
  • Employee Engagement:
  • Develop and implement employee engagement initiatives.
  • Conduct surveys to measure employee satisfaction.
  • Organize team-building activities and events.
  • Foster a positive work environment.
  • Legal Compliance:
  • Stay informed about labor laws and regulations.
  • Ensure HR policies and practices comply with legal requirements.
  • Handle disciplinary actions and terminations in compliance with laws.
  • Health and Safety:
  • Implement and monitor workplace health and safety programs.
  • Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations.
  • Investigate and report workplace accidents.
  • Strategic HR Planning:
  • Contribute to the development of HR strategies and objectives.
  • Work with senior management on workforce planning.
  • Provide HR insights for organizational decision-making
details.title: HR Executive

Here, you will be part of a young and dynamic team, containing already several engineers and IT experts with different backgrounds, within the IT department of Alter Domus. In this role, you will provide level 2 support to over 1100 users, performing eFront setup, customization, server-side, and configuration changes. You should be a team player and an excellent communicator. While production support is the primary responsibility, duties may also include Release Management, DevOps, and contributing to our platform strategy to drive continuous improvements. You will work closely with our other IT and Platform Delivery Teams to deliver best-in-class support to our growing user base.

details.description:
As a site reliability engineer on the operations team, you will be solving interesting challenges in a fast-paced environment by designing, deploying, and troubleshooting state-of-the-art AI platforms and services with great attention to reliability, security, scalability, operability, and performance. Working alongside engineering teams that are building cutting edge technologies revolutionizing the AI landscape, you will leverage your experience across software, systems, infrastructure, and production operations to lead key initiatives that enable us to rapidly deliver reliable and scalable service for customers in a hybrid deployment pattern. The ideal candidate for this highly visible and critical role will have the knowledge of a software engineer, the experience of a systems and infrastructure engineer, and a strong passion for troubleshooting and automation across bare metal data center infrastructure and public cloud services.


Responsibilities:

  • Assume full-stack ownership for the successful delivery of our SambaNova services in a hybrid model, including, but not limited to, deployment, configuration, integrations, observability, and ongoing operations
  • Develop a deep understanding of the end-to-end configurations, dependencies, customer requirements, and overall characteristics of the production services as the accountable owner for overall service operations
  • Systems and application administration for multiple customer-facing production environments (hosted and on-premise), with a continued focus on improving efficiencies, availability, and supportability through automation and well-defined run-books
  • Partner and collaborate with product and engineering teams to recommend and implement improvements to the security, resilience, and operational readiness of our systems, with the flexibility to integrate into unique customer environments
  • Augment ongoing efforts to design and develop automation for deployments, updates, and upgrades of the entire SambaNova software stack
  • Lead efforts to triage, debug, and fix issues related to networks, storage, operating systems, containers, and applications to drive proactive and reactive incident resolution and root cause analysis
  • Build the systems and tools for centralized command and control of distributed environments
  • Participate in on-call rotation responsibilities


Requirements:

We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled center lead to join our Systems Data Center team in Hyderabad. The team is responsible for the design, build, and coverage of firmwide critical infrastructure, including data centers, and machine rooms. This is a hands-on management role and offers the opportunity to be part of an inclusive, collaborative, and engaging working environment.


Responsibilities:

  • In this role, you will supervise and provide guidance to data center technicians, oversee the daily operations of the data center, ensure smooth functioning and adherence to standard procedures, and monitor and prioritize daily workflow to ensure the timely completion of tasks.
  • You will also be responsible for racking, building, installing, and troubleshooting servers, storage, and networking equipment in the data center.
  • You will identify and implement enhancements to processes and policies while collaborating with global teams and vendors to identify, diagnose, and resolve technical and non-technical issues.
  • Additionally, you will maintain accurate documentation of actions and resolutions in internal tools, adhere to standard data center processes and ensure high standards of cabling and labeling, provide on-call support during on- and off-hours, including weekends, and complete required updates in DCIM (Data Center Infrastructure Management) and inventory management systems.
  • You will also be responsible for overseeing DC capacity management, which includes both managing daily requirements and forecasting future needs through effective communication and collaboration with other infrastructure teams.


Requirements:

  • Candidates with 8 to 12 years of relevant experience managing teams and operations within a data center environment
  • The candidate should have a good understanding of hardware, software, electrical power, and peripheral equipment
  • The ideal candidate should have knowledge of various cable and connector types, such as fiber optic and twisted pair
  • The candidate should be familiar with different operating systems and system tools, including Windows/Linux and Cisco IOS
  • Ideal candidate should have experience with manufacturer-specific hardware and tools, such as Dell iDRAC and Cisco CIMC
  • The ideal candidate should have excellent troubleshooting skills, including the ability to diagnose and fix hardware failures and network issues
  • Candidate should have hands-on experience in a data center
  • The candidate should have excellent organizational skills and the ability to manage and prioritize multiple tasks
  • The candidate should have effective communication skills, both written and verbal
  • Candidate should be flexible in their working hours, including evenings and weekends

details.description:
We are looking for experienced and highly motivated Cloud Security Analysts to join our journey and be a part of the India Security Resource Centre (SRC) Team. The India SRC will comprise a team of Security Analysts who operate in a 24x7x365 environment and work with customers across the globe to enhance their security footprint and detect, prevent and mitigate vulnerabilities and incidents. The Security Analyst is a front line operations role and requires an understanding of various security assessments and engaging with customers on alerts, remediation recommendations and escalations. This will be supported in this role from time to time by the Security Research Group. Joining this team provides a unique opportunity to build a global security resource center and benefit from the best of Israeli cybersecurity talent and influence the direction of a world-class offering in the cyber-security domain.


Responsibilities:

  • Understand the company offering and customer cloud and security deployments/environments
  • Triage and analyse various security assessments and timely investigate security incidents.
  • Formulate, communicate and engage with customers on related alerts and remediation instructions.
  • This will include applying playbook-driven solutions, initiating incident investigations/response and escalating to the Security Research Group as required.
  • Promptly resolve customer tickets and be the first point of contact for customer escalations.
  • Document assessments, recommendations and customer engagements till resolution
  • Work closely with multiple teams (CSM, Security Research, Incident Response, Product) to resolve customer events/incidents/escalations and evolve the company offering
  • Share learnings and best practices amongst team members including keeping internal knowledge databases updated
  • Handle multiple competing priorities and high impact incidents/escalations


Requirements:

  • Bachelors' degree in Computer Science/Engineering, Electrical Engineering or related domain certifications
  • SOC/Security operations experience is a must.
  • Cloud environment exp. (AWS, Azure, GCPeither of them, there is azure sentinel which is aSIEM tool,
  • 5+ years experience in customer-facing operations roles with SOC/MDR teams handling multiple customers preferably in the cyber security/network security domains
  • Should have worked closely with multiple teams (CSM, Security Research, Incident Response, Product) to resolve customer events/incidents/escalations.
  • Experience in or knowledge of cybersecurity assessments and incident management
  • Experience with security solutions such as SOC, MDR, SIEM, SOAR, WAF, IPS, DAM, etc.
  • Understanding the cyber-security landscape including common threats and attack scenarios
  • Experience with monitoring, ticketing, and CRM tools
  • Strong team player with the flexibility to work in shifts in a 24x7x365 environment
  • Strong communication skills including high proficiency in English
  • Ability to deal with multiple customer profiles and personalities
  • Knowledge of networking architecture and protocols (TCP/IP, HTTP, DNS, TLS etc. )
  • Knowledge of Cloud security principles
  • Security certifications such as CEH, CSA, OSCP, OSWE, or OSEE
details.title: Senior Cloud Security Analyst

details.description:
The Chief Information Security Office (CISO) is home to deeply talented colleagues who work to ensure the safety of Citi's clients, our revenue, our employees, and our proprietary data. We manage information security as one end-to-end program - one with a clear mandate and accountability. Our mission is a program that is fully anchored to modern control and architectural frameworks, is fully aligned with the enterprise architecture of the firm, and is deeply integrated into the sectors and functions.


Citi has an extensive and robust AI program, with strong global partnerships and business activities in progress. We view Generative AI as a significant opportunity, one we want to move quickly and embrace, but also one we want to embed security principles and engineering excellence into early. The security engineer reports to the CISO organization with dedicated functional alignment to Citi's Generative AI enablement group to enable close, collaborative strategic work to jointly design, engineer, and run the capabilities needed to enable Gen AI and protect Citi and our assets.


Responsibilities:

  • Work within a dedicate security engineering function that accelerates and delivers creative and secure capabilities to unlock the value of Gen AI
  • Perform security assessments including threat modeling and security integration of Gen AI platforms and business solutions. Ensure that security design and controls are consistent with the organization's security architecture principles.
  • Perform model input and output security including prompt injection and security assurance
  • Provide thought leadership and creativity to mature Gen AI security governance embedding into our existing cyber security risk appetite framework
  • Build internal and external networks to ensure alignment across programs, and industry best practices, and to maintain current knowledge regarding cybersecurity threats and risks. Communicate with peers, regulators, law enforcement, etc., when necessary.
  • Understand the current external threat environment and advise relevant stakeholders on the appropriate courses of action, promoting security as an enabler for business innovation and digitization, including the evaluation and recommendation of technical controls. Leverage threat intelligence to enhance engineering and operations
  • Identify, assess, track, and report on security issues identified in supplier/third-party due diligence processes, self-assessments, architectural reviews, application testing, vulnerability scans, bug bounty programs, penetration testing, change management, cyber exercises, reviews, and audits. Technically advise stakeholders on recommendations and remediation/mitigation plans.
  • Ideate and leverage Gen AI to solve cybersecurity problems at scale for Citi
  • Support Global Information Security policies, standards, and initiatives development and implementation by representing different Citi action groups such as Delegated Action Groups (DAG).
  • Partner with CISO engineering and Gen AI engineering organizations, directly embedded, in both leading and supporting capaCities


Requirements:

  • 7+ years of Information Security experience in areas of Information/Application Security
  • 5+ years of Software engineering and/or software development experience is required
  • Good understanding of application and data security, AI/Gen AI, Machine Learning, or data science
  • Demonstrated knowledge of software development processes (SLDC/Agile/Iterative/DevOps)
  • Experience in delivering security solution architecture from end to end.
  • Threat modeling using industry-standard methodologies (e. g. STRIDE/DREAD)
  • Security architecture assessments for one or more IT systems such as Web, Mobile, APIs/Microservices, Cloud (AWS/GCP/Azure/Oracle)
  • Experience developing Reference Security Architecture and Design Patterns to support proactive and automated controls
  • Demonstrated experience with cyber engineering and operations, which could include DevSecOps and MLSecOps
  • A demonstrated knowledge of information security standards, rules, and regulations related to information security and data confidentiality and other various security standards and policies.
  • Ability to keep up to date with technology and security. Make informed decisions and appropriate adjustments.
  • Ability to operate effectively across a highly matrixed, global business environment.
  • Good leadership, strategic thinking, and large-scale planning abilities.
  • Good interpersonal and communication skills with the ability to influence at all levels of the organization, while being able to simplify complex IS topics
  • Excellent problem-solving abilities and analytical skills
  • Ability to apply a broad and comprehensive understanding across multiple functional areas.
  • Strong work ethic, and an excellent use of discretion and judgment.

As we rapidly expand, our goal is to become the ultimate platform for staking, DeFi, NFTs, and social within Cosmos. Responsibilities:

  • Spearheaded the development and continuous enhancement of Leap's design systems and libraries. Your role is pivotal in establishing and maintaining a consistent and effective design language across all our platforms.

employer.company_tagline: Creating a feeling of home
employer.instahyre_note: Wayfair is the online destination for the home and a pure-play online retailer that offers a wide range of home goods and furniture products for the bedroom, living room, kitchen and dining, bathroom, and more.

details.description:
The Growth & Ad Platforms Engineering team is responsible for building Wayfair's class-leading, data-centric technology platform that optimizes and powers all of Wayfair's paid advertising. It touches hundreds of millions of consumers and drives billions of dollars in annual revenue. Our platforms allow us to scale our marketing efforts efficiently by automating key processes, interacting with ad vendors in real time, and leveraging hundreds of terabytes of data and ML algorithms for optimization and effective decision-making on millions of items in our catalog. The types of systems built by this team range from low latency REST APIs to real-time streaming systems to high-performance large-scale batch systems.


Responsibilities:

  • Take complex engineering problems, design appropriate solutions, and deliver them fairly independently with limited oversight.
  • Work on a variety of technologies - from large batch processes using Apache Beam and Spark, to event-based systems using Kafka, K8s, and Flink to robust REST APIs.
  • Architect and implement robust, well-tested services. Provide technical design and code reviews for peers within your team and across the broader Growth & Ad Platforms org.
  • Provide insights into opportunity areas for the platform, influencing priorities and team roadmaps in close partnership with Engineering and Product leadership.
  • Be a multiplier, mentor other engineers on the team, and help them become more productive and implement engineering best practices.
  • Promote a culture of engineering excellence, up-leveling the technical expertise of engineers across Growth & Ad Platforms org.


Requirements:

  • 5+ years of experience in software engineering and designing systems at scale.
  • Experience developing applications using technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, SQL, and React
  • Experience with Google Cloud Services such as PubSub, Dataflow, and Dataproc would be a plus
  • Experience with Continuous Integration (CI/CD) practices and tools.
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills.
  • Ability to work effectively with engineers, product managers, and business stakeholders alike
  • Experience mentoring engineers and leading code reviews.
  • A track record of delivering in increments and learning as you go
details.title: Software Engineer II

As an Implementation lead, you will be responsible for leading a team of solution architects and leading the strategic development and delivery of our product solutions, ensuring that they align with the needs of our clients and drive business growth. You will also play a pivotal role in influencing our product roadmap, as well as identifying opportunities for innovation and expansion in the market.


Responsibilities:

  • Develop and execute the overall product solutions and implementation strategy, including defining implementation playbooks, product features, and prioritising development efforts to drive business growth and customer satisfaction.
  • Conduct customer pilots to validate the effectiveness of proposed solutions and make recommendations for improvement based on pilot results.
  • Lead a team of solution architects, fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment focused on delivering high-quality solutions that meet and exceed customer expectations.
  • Act as the key liaison between the product development team and delivery teams, ensuring clear communication and alignment on product goals, timelines, and deliverables.
  • Monitor and analyse product performance metrics, architecture, customer feedback, and industry developments to iterate on existing solutions and drive continuous improvement.
  • Stay updated on industry best practices and technological advancements, leveraging this knowledge to drive the evolution of our product offerings and maintain our competitive edge in the market.
  • Conduct training sessions to ensure your team is equipped with the necessary product knowledge and skills to deliver exceptional solutions to our clients.
  • Periodically assess and refine the onboarding process to streamline operations and enhance overall efficiency.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in business, computer science, engineering, or a related field. Advanced degrees or relevant certifications are a plus.
  • Proven experience (3+ years) in a lead role within the SaaS industry, with a focus on product management, solutions development, technical onboarding or related areas.
  • Demonstrated success in leading and managing cross-functional teams, fostering collaboration, and driving a culture of innovation and excellence.
  • Strong understanding of SaaS product development lifecycles, market trends, and customer needs, with the ability to translate these insights into effective product strategies.
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively convey complex technical information to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  • Strategic mindset with strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, capable of making data-driven decisions and prioritising initiatives based on business impact and customer value.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to handle challenging situations with a customer-centric approach.
details.title: Implementation Lead

We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Key Account Manager to join our team. As a Key Account Manager, you will be responsible for maintaining and expanding relationships with strategically important clients. You will be the primary point of contact for key clients, working to ensure their satisfaction and driving the growth of these accounts.


Responsibilities:

  • Develop and nurture strong relationships with key clients, serving as their main point of contact and building a deep understanding of their business needs, objectives, and challenges.
  • Create and execute strategic account plans that align with the company's objectives and the client's goals, identifying growth opportunities and maximizing value for both parties.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Sales, Marketing, and Customer Service to address customer needs and develop tailored solutions that meet client objectives.
  • Drive revenue growth through upselling, cross-selling, and identifying new business opportunities within the key accounts.
  • Monitor account performance and key metrics, preparing regular reports and providing insights to both the client and internal teams to drive continuous improvement and success.
  • Proactively manage and resolve any issues or concerns that arise, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction and retention.
  • Stay updated on industry trends and market conditions to anticipate the needs of key clients and provide innovative solutions and services.
  • Negotiate contracts and agreements with clients, ensuring mutually beneficial terms for both parties.
  • Travel to meet with clients as necessary and attend industry events and conferences to strengthen relationships and gather market insights.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, Marketing, or a related field. A master's degree is a plus.
  • Proven experience in key account management, sales, or relevant customer-facing roles.
  • Demonstrated success in meeting and exceeding sales targets and KPIs.
  • Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
  • Strong problem-solving abilities and a strategic mindset.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects and relationships simultaneously.
  • Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite.
  • Willingness to travel as needed.
  • The ideal candidate for this role will possess strong interpersonal skills, a strategic mindset, and a proactive approach to account management. The ability to build and nurture relationships, coupled with a results-oriented focus, is crucial for success in this position.

details.description:
We are looking for a Salesforce master with a wealth of technical expertise, a Flow virtuoso, and excellent communication and organizational skills in a global environment. Your ability to harness the power of Salesforce while effectively collaborating with others across the world will make you an invaluable asset to the organization.


Responsibilities:

  • In this role, you will experience a dynamic work environment where your expertise and collaboration skills are central to daily operations. Your typical day will include:
  • Collaboration with Business Stakeholders: You'll work closely with business stakeholders to understand their requirements and translate them into effective Salesforce solutions.
  • Process Analysis and Improvement: Analyzing and documenting business processes to identify opportunities for automation and efficiency improvements. This will involve exploring ways to streamline workflows and data management.
  • Communication Skills: Effective communication is at the core of this role. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams, translating business requirements into technical specifications and vice versa. Your ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders is vital.
  • Salesforce Expertise: Your deep technical knowledge will be instrumental in designing, configuring, and maintaining Salesforce solutions that align with our business objectives. You may also lead or contribute to Salesforce-related projects, including system upgrades, migrations, and new implementations.
  • Technical Mastery: You'll use your proven track record of crafting custom solutions and automation within Salesforce to enhance sales, marketing, and service operations. Your problem-solving skills will be integral in dissecting complex technical challenges and developing elegant solutions.
  • Integration and Data Management: Designing and implementing data integration solutions to connect Salesforce with other systems, such as ERP, marketing automation, or customer support platforms. Ensuring data quality and consistency by developing and enforcing data governance best practices.
  • Reporting and Analytics: Creating and maintaining custom reports and dashboards to provide insights to stakeholders for data-driven decision-making. Analyzing key performance indicators (KPIs) and providing recommendations for continuous improvement.
  • User Training and Support: Providing training and support to Salesforce users, ensuring they can effectively use the platform to meet their needs. Addressing user inquiries and troubleshooting issues as they arise.
  • Documentation and Best Practices: Documenting system configurations, customizations, and processes to ensure knowledge sharing and adherence to best practices. Staying up-to-date with Salesforce releases and new features to identify opportunities for enhancements.


Requirements:

  • To excel in this role, you'll need to bring the following qualifications and attributes:
  • Salesforce Mastery: 5+ years of experience with the salesforce ecosystem either in a professional services setting or directly at customer sites as an implementer.
  • Deep knowledge of sales & support processes.
  • Documentation and Best Practices: A commitment to documenting system configurations, customizations, and processes while staying up-to-date with Salesforce releases and new features.
  • Excellent communication skills in a global environment.
details.title: Salesforce Technical Consultant

details.description:
As a Flutter Developer with 1 year of experience, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining mobile applications using the Flutter framework. Your primary focus will be creating high-quality, efficient, and visually appealing cross-platform applications for both Android and iOS platforms. You will collaborate with a team of developers, designers, and product managers to deliver cutting-edge mobile solutions.


Responsibilities:

  • Mobile App Development: Design and build mobile applications using the Flutter framework, ensuring high performance and responsiveness across various devices and screen sizes.
  • Cross-Platform Development: Develop cross-platform applications that work seamlessly on Android and iOS platforms, reducing development time and effort.
  • Code Implementation: Translate design wireframes and mockups into clean and maintainable code, ensuring the best possible user experience and visual fidelity.
  • Bug Fixing and Maintenance: Identify and resolve application defects, bugs, and performance issues to maintain the overall health of the mobile applications.
  • UI/UX Integration: Work closely with designers to integrate UI elements and animations effectively to deliver a delightful user experience.
  • API Integration: Integrate RESTful APIs and other data sources to enable smooth data flow and interaction with the backend services.
  • Version Control: Utilise version control systems (e. g., Git) to manage the codebase efficiently and collaborate with other team members.
  • Continuous Learning: Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in mobile app development, particularly Flutter and related technologies, and apply them to enhance the application's performance and functionality.
  • Team Collaboration: Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and backend developers, to ensure a seamless development process.
  • Testing and Debugging: Conduct thorough testing of applications and debug issues to maintain a high standard of code quality.
  • Documentation: Maintain proper documentation of code, implementation details, and processes to ensure clarity and understanding within the team.


Requirements:

  • 1-year experience in mobile app development using the Flutter framework.
  • Proficiency in Dart programming language, as it is the primary language used in Flutter development.
  • Strong knowledge of mobile app architecture patterns (e. g., BLoC, Provider) and state management.
  • Experience with RESTful APIs, JSON, and integrating third-party libraries.
  • Understanding of Material Design guidelines and ability to implement custom UI components.
  • Knowledge of version control systems, especially Git, for code collaboration and management.
  • Familiarity with mobile app testing, debugging, and performance optimization techniques.
  • Problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically to identify and fix issues effectively.
  • Good communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively within a team.
  • A portfolio or examples of previous Flutter projects will be an added advantage.
  • A portfolio or examples of native Android or iOS projects will be an added advantage
details.title: Flutter Developer

  • Ensure that all branded items adhere to quality standards and reflect the client's corporate identity.
  • Coordinate with logistics teams to ensure timely and accurate delivery of personalised gift packages.

  • Great problem solver with innovative ideas, to quickly resolve and bring issues to closure
  • Plus: hands-on experience in one of the following areas: online video platform(OVP), and digital analytics.
  • Plus: experience working with a global engineering team.

details.description:
We are currently seeking a Telematics System Lead. This position requires an experienced professional with a background in various related domains such as Infotainment & Telematics Systems Engineering, Connected Infotainment, Telematics Hardware & Software design & development and testing.


Telematics System Lead would focus on designing, development & validation of next gen systems, evaluate technology & perform trade space analysis in choosing technology, allocate and review tasks allocated to Engineers, Build & Mentor teams.


Responsibilities:

  • Define the features from user story level to detailed functional requirements.
  • Collaborate with different teams & stakeholders and ensure that all details are available for successful implementation by the engineers.
  • Be aware of the advancement in infotainment, Telematics & Domain controller Hardware architecture
  • To work with the UI/UX design team, Hardware & software Engineering teamsto define market leading solutions considering timing, cost, and risks
  • Represent system requirements and proactively review the implementation of them during the software sprints.
  • Track and coordinate the hardware team for timely delivery of Hardware development milestones
  • Bench marking and awareness of competitor products and offeringsfrom automotive & consumer product landscape
  • IP aware in area of infotainment & telematics system and strive for growing company IP portfolio
  • Define the testing & validation requirement for Infotainment & Telematics systems.
  • Define & review test plan & test cases
  • Involved in technical inputs to RFI / RFQ process- To Sourcing and Sales / Marketing.
  • Works with Engineering Program Management to provide feasibility and planning information.
  • Participates in internal and external technical reviews, as required.
  • Propose and initiate automotive technology projects and activities aligning with department level roadmap.
  • Focus on searching, experimenting, and deploying cutting-edge systems to achieve enterprise level strategies.


Requirements:

  • Experienced in Infotainment & Telematics Systems Development, Requirements, Systems testing,
  • Functional safety and having a strong Infotainment & Telematics Systems Engineering skill set.
  • Interfaces with multiple stakeholders to understand requirements, domains, viable technologies and development activities for Infotainment & Telematics System and associated systems development.
  • Alignment of Infotainment & Telematics system requirements between various systems, Hardware, Software, UI/UX team and other stakeholders
  • End to End to product management life cycle management for Infotainment& Telematics system involving following stage- conception, Requirement generation, Specification definition, Project development tracking, System functional testing and signing off for production.
  • Knowledge of Infotainment Systems, Telematics System, Vehicle instrument cluster systems
  • Experience on requirements preparation for Infotainment, Telematics, Cluster systems
  • Functional Knowledge of Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, 2G, 3G, 4G,
  • Experiential Knowledge of display modules, Modems, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi modules
  • Excellence in analytical thinking, problem solving & Root cause analysis Automotive Engineering: Knowledge of vehicle Electrical and Electronics architecture.
  • Good awareness of Various vehicle domains, systems and components, Automotive Development life cycle & Embedded Software Development life cycle
  • Experience in Systems development methodology - Use case elicitation, Requirements Management, Functions analysis & allocation, verification & validation.
  • Experience in Change and Configuration management
  • Ability to communicate complex ideas seamlessly and persuasively to peers, management, suppliers, customers, and other stakeholders.
  • Good technical leadership, planning & organization skills in relevant areas.
  • Good team collaboration and interpersonal skills.
  • Excellent risk management skills, experienced in performing trade space analysis and weighting safety against availability / allocation.
  • Good analytical, logical reasoning & problem-solving skills.
  • Effective Communication to be able to deal with cross-functional team members- Marketing, Design, Hardware, Software, Vehicle systems & Validation.
  • Fluent in communication - Written and Spoken English.
  • Bachelor's degree or above in Electronics & Communication/Electrical Engineering
  • 3 to 5 years of experience in Automotive product development (Gone through at least 1 or 2 product lifecycles).
  • 2 Years minimum in Automotive advanced & connected Infotainment/Telematics/Cluster Systems development
details.title: Lead System Engineer - Telematics
